info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Rudolta of the Sleigh
collection.openText: With my infinite hatred, I give you this gift.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Normal, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a normal probability.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a high probability.
When $0 escaped, it slowly moved throughout the facility, inflicting WHITE damage to employees near it.

etc.param: #0’s young daughter would spend Christmas time alone because she would make a living by herself.
#0 would consume dozens of pills one fateful Christmas Day.
#0 would cry alone as their loved one left them by the next Christmas.
#0 would receive the news of a loved one’s death while standing under a wondrously decorated Christmas tree.
#0 would be run over by a truck full of presents on Christmas Eve, and would never be able to walk again.
#0 would be told by their doctor that they’ve contracted a terminal illness on Christmas Eve.
#0’s house roof would collapse under the weight of the snow, and no one would survive. All this would happen a few years later one fateful Christmas Day.
